tool_description: Analyzes transit network accessibility by calculating service coverage, travel time to destinations, and equity metrics across different population groups.

route_data.description: Path to route network data or identifier

destination_points.description: Coordinates of key destinations [lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, ...]

max_access_time.description: Maximum acceptable travel time in minutes (30-120)

error_messages: Route data not accessible: Check route_data path and format compatibility.
Invalid destination coordinates: destination_points must be valid lat/lon pairs.
Population data not found: Verify population_data path exists and is readable.
Invalid access time: max_access_time must be between 30-120 minutes.
Invalid walking speed: walking_speed must be between 3-6 km/h.
usage: Provide route network, destination coordinates, and population data. Configure accessibility parameters. Returns coverage and accessibility metrics.

coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of study area covered by transit service

average_access_time.description: Average travel time to destinations in minutes
